Entries.Maru: #$c .5#Strange that it's raining in winter.$s#We didn't used to get rain in winter like this. Dad says this might be due to climate change.$s#

Entries.summer_Tue6: Gosh, a nice ripe melon would be good in this oppressive heat.
Entries.Resort_Pier: Look, @, do you see an ocra?

Entries.summer_Mon6: Mom wants me to drop by Pierre's and pick up some veggies for dinner.#$b#@, have you sold anything interesting to Pierre lately?
Entries.1: @, why did you decide to come to Pelican Town?
Entries.1_2: @, you've been in Pelican Town for quite a while now, haven't you? Are you glad you picked here for your new home?
Entries.2{{YearRemainder}}: One of the difficulties of creating a good robotic limb is just power management. Batteries can be quite heavy.$s
Entries.3{{YearRemainder}}: I wish I had a better relationship with my brother. Think of all the things we could build together!
Entries.4{{YearRemainder}}: Penny and I spent yesterday building robots with the kids. It's a fun little science project to do with them.
Entries.5{{YearRemainder}}: Harvey pays me pretty well, and lets me read when there isn't any other work to do.$h
Entries.6{{YearRemainder}}: There's a lot more paperwork that goes on in a doctor's office than I would have thought when I started this job.$s
Entries.7{{YearRemainder}}: The fax machine at work broke. Do you know how expensive it is to get someone out here to fix a fax machine?$s#$b#I would fix it myself but it's full of proprietary parts.$s
Entries.8{{YearRemainder}}: Saw a really interesting paper out of %name group on bipedal robots the other day!#$b#They've got a new algorithm to help the robot keep its balance.
Entries.9{{YearRemainder}}: Sometimes, I stop and think....how much of my brain is spent on just keeping my balance? It's amazing how easy this is for humans, and how hard it is for robots.$h
Entries.10{{YearRemainder}}: %Maru is speaking to herself.#$b#Hmmm. How much torque do I need?#$e#Oh, @, I didn't see you there!
Entries.11{{YearRemainder}}: Hmmm, think I need a bigger battery...
Entries.12{{YearRemainder}}: Ordering spare parts from Joja is convenient, but sometimes I wish more electronic shops still remained.
Entries.13{{YearRemainder}}: Man, sometimes I wish I lived somewhere less...rural. I'd love to go out dancing more.$s

Entries.1_2: Ah, @, it's the start of a new month! What do you have planned?
Entries.2_2: Since my dad works there, I can audit classes at Grampleton University for free.#$b#It's fun taking classes in new things!
Entries.8_2: Sometimes I wonder if Sebastian would be happier living in the city.#$b#He doesn't really like living with other people though, and the city's so expensive it's hard to get by without roommates.
Entries.9_2: I like working at the clinic. Dad says I should be doing more with my life, though.
Entries.11_2: Mom wishes she could have sent Sebastian to college. She says....no, never mind.
Entries.13_2: Say, @, you planting anything interesting on that farm of yours?
Entries.14_2: Dad? Dad's an ecologist. He's partnered with Grampleton University.
Entries.15_2: I really enjoy building things. Not sure where I'm going with my current project, but it's sure fun to just play around.
Entries.17_2: Dad bought me unleaded solder. It's really not the same.
Entries.19_2: I wish I got along better with my brother.$s
Entries.20_2: Do you have any fresh strawberries? Penny and I are thinking of doing a DNA extraction with the kids. Fun little kitchen science experiment.#$b#Strawberries are best because they're hexaploid, so they have a lot of DNA you can extract.$h
Entries.22_2: I saw an owl last night when I was looking at the stars!

Entries.1_2: I know some people have floated the idea of my mother becoming mayor after Mayor Lewis retires, but, honestly, I think she loves her woodworking more.
Entries.2_2: Owls have special feathers along the edges their wings that let them fly silently.#$b#Isn't biology cool?$h
Entries.3_2: Dad thinks I should...uh, 'further my education'.
Entries.4_2: Saturating math? Who makes a processor like that anymore?

Entries.1_2: Ugh, I gotta make a trip to the post office sooner or later...$s
Entries.2_2: I can't find my good screwdriver set.$s
